page.title: 05H.M.S.DAEDALUS,LEE-ON-SOLENT
page.content: {H.M.S.Daedalus}is a big{Fleet Air {Arm}base.It has yellow hangars as big as ten garages. The roads and run-ways are endless;winding in and out.In one of the hangars there are about twenty {Wessex helicopters}lined up in a row. Their tails and rotor blades are folded up to make more room.The helicopters have used up all their flying hours and are no longer in service although it is possible that they could fly. There are also about four aeroplanes in the hangar opposite the helicopters,one is a{Swordfish. The helicopters and aeroplanes look a lot bigger in real life than they do in the films. The helicopters in the hangar are used by the trainee engineers to practise on.Once a year the base is open to the public .This day is called {Air Day.
